remarks: Move universal quantifier in and out of class substitution. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2004.)  Obsolete as of 17-Aug-2018.  Use ~ sbcal instead.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
sbcalgOLD $p |- ( A e. V -> ( [. A / y ]. A. x ph <-> A. x [. A / y ]. ph ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d x y $.
